wblut.hemesh.geom
Class WB_XYZ

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.geom.WB_XYZ
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<WB_XYZ>
Direct Known Subclasses:
WB_Normal, WB_Point, WB_Vector
public class WB_XYZ
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<WB_XYZ>

Abstract class. Implements common methods for WB_Point, WB_Vector and WB_Normal

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut) 2010
